easy.q: I am round and bright in the daytime sky. I follow you across a sunny lawn, but I vanish at night. What am I?
easy.hint: It's the big ball in the sky you see all day.

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?
medium.hint: Think of a small number becoming bigger.

hard.q: A box has two lids that cannot be opened at the same time. If you open one lid, the other stays closed. What concept is this describing?
hard.hint: Two options that cannot occur together.
